com.mesosphere.sdk.offer

Class ResourceUtils

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.mesosphere.sdk.offer.ResourceUtils

  • public class ResourceUtils
extends java.lang.Object
    This class encapsulates common methods for scanning collections of Resources.

    • Method Detail

      • getAllResources

        public static java.util.List<Protos.Resource> getAllResources(java.util.Collection<TaskInfo> taskInfos)
        Returns a list of all the resources associated with one or more tasks, including Executor resources. The returned resources may contain duplicates if multiple tasks have copies of the same resource.

      • getAllResources

        public static java.util.List<Protos.Resource> getAllResources(Protos.TaskInfo taskInfo)
        Returns a list of all the resources associated with a task, including Executor resources.
        Parameters:
        taskInfo - The Protos.TaskInfo containing the Protos.Resource.
        Returns:
        a list of Protos.Resources.

      • getResourceIds

        public static java.util.List<java.lang.String> getResourceIds(java.util.Collection<Resource> resources)
        Returns a list of unique resource IDs associated with Resources.
        Parameters:
        resources - Collection of resources from which to extract the unique resource IDs
        Returns:
        List of unique resource IDs
